entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Kakabeka Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:14 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 12:00 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -9.6°C
Wind: ENE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
